global_caption: a scene featuring an old man wearing a black beret and a gray cardigan over a white shirt, also wearing navy pants and black shoes, a woman wearing a flower-covered white dress who is smiling and is 30 years old, and a man wearing a blue shirt and beige shorts and black slippers, holding a brown basket with his right hand and a tray with his left hand that has 20 bottles of water on it
